name: Stones Throw
description:
In "Stones Throw", you skip stones across water to reach a goal. Its a casual game similar to golf, featuring beautiful 3d environments and relaxing music and sound fx.

  • 5 courses, with 8 goals each.
  • 6 professional music tracks.
  • Randomized details, like trees and grass.
  • Animated sky with day-to-night cycles. *
  • Simple point-and-click controls.
  • Graphics option for "retro fx".

Linux and Mac versions have NOT been tested. Mobile version is low-res. Please try the demo before purchasing and contact me if you have any problems.
* Animated sky not available on Android.

Support, questions, feedback, email: Games@virtueone.com
